commands.title: Ninja: Synchronize Object IDs with Azure Back End
Ninja: Automatically Synchronize Object IDs for Entire Workspace

objectIdNinja.backEndUrl.markdownDescription: URL of the back-end API you want to communicate with. This API must support the same functionality as https://github.com/vjekob/al-objid/tree/master/azure-function-app. You must not include `https` or any leading or training slashes. **Important:** The endpoint must be on the HTTPS protocol. Examples are: `my-al-objectid.azurewebsites.net`, `myids.contoso.com`. Incorrect examples are: `https://my-al-objectid.azurewebsites.net/` or `http://mids.contoso.com/`

objectIdNinja.backEndAPIKey.markdownDescription: API key used to access the back-end. This API key is passed as `x-functions-key` header to all of API endpoints. When using Azure Functions, make sure this is the app key that can authorize access to all individual functions in the app.

objectIdNinja.backEndUrlPoll.markdownDescription: URL of the back-end polling API you want to communicate with. This API must support the same functionality as https://github.com/vjekob/al-objid/tree/master/azure-polling-app. You must not include `https` or any leading or training slashes. **Important:** The endpoint must be on the HTTPS protocol. Examples are: `my-al-objectid-poll.azurewebsites.net`, `myids-poll.contoso.com`. Incorrect examples are: `https://my-al-objectid-poll.azurewebsites.net/` or `http://mids-poll.contoso.com/`

objectIdNinja.backEndAPIKeyPoll.markdownDescription: API key used to access the polling back-end. This API key is passed as `x-functions-key` header to all of API endpoints. When using Azure Functions, make sure this is the app key that can authorize access to all individual functions in the app.

objectIdNinja.showEventLogNotifications.description: Show notifications when other developers create objects in the app you are working on.

objectIdNinja.overrideUserName.description: Name to be shown in notification messages. If you leave this empty, Object ID Ninja will use your OS user name (or your Git user name in future versions).

objectIdNinja.useVerboseOutputLogging.markdownDescription: Switch this on if you want very detailed messages in the AL Object ID Ninja output channel.

objectIdNinja.showReleaseNotes.markdownDescription: Whenever you update AL Object ID Ninja to a new version that includes important updates, we'll show you the release notes. If you prefer not being interrupted, switch this option off.

objectIdNinja.showRangeWarnings.markdownDescription: Show notifications when the available range is about to run out. **It's a good idea to keep this option switched on!**

objectIdNinja.requestPerRange.description: Requires that next IDs are retrieved per range. For example, if an app declares multiple ranges, Ninja will suggest the next ID from each range where IDs are available. User can then choose the range from which the ID will be assigned.
